amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce the salary of Michael Connor, Assistant Secretary of the Army for Civil Works, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 291 (Roll no. 547).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 291 (Roll no. 547).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
